General.Name: China CYTS Tours Holding Co Ltd
General.Description: China Cyts Tours Holding Co., Ltd. operates as a tourism company in Mainland China, Hong Kong, and internationally. It also offers services, such as event management, public relations communication, digital marketing, conference exhibition, sports marketing, etc. In addition, the company engages in the scenic spot, IT hardware agency and system integration, welfare lottery technology service, and building leasing businesses; and investment, development, and operation management of domestic mid-end boutique hotel chains. Further, it operates Aoyou.com, a one-stop comprehensive Internet tourism service platform, as well as hotel operation and management platform; and provides travel management and tourist transportation services. The company was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
